languages.text: "Да что это такое... у фон Валанциусов в крови — тянуть руки к любой непонятной гадости! И почему я не выбрал службу в тылу, интендантом какого-нибудь склада магнитных катушек?" {n}Абеляр, взволнованно перебирающий снаряжение, вскидывает голову.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы пришли в себя! И даже лекарства не понадобились. Вот удача-то!"

"In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"
languages.original_text: "Да что это такое... у фон Валанциусов в крови — тянуть руки к любой непонятной гадости! И почему я не выбрал службу в тылу, интендантом какого-нибудь склада магнитных катушек?" {n}Абеляр, взволнованно перебирающий снаряжение, вскидывает голову.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы пришли в себя! И даже лекарства не понадобились. Вот удача-то!"

And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

languages.text: “泰拉的一切神圣之物在上……你们冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人无论遇到什么古怪东西，都一定要刨根问底！你们家族的人都是这个样子！我当时怎么就没选个远离前线的和平岗位呢？比如磁力线圈仓库的军需官之类的。”{n}阿贝拉德一直在焦躁地翻找着装备。此刻，他猛地抬起了头。{/n}“舰长大人，您恢复神智了！而且连医疗包都没用上。真是侥幸脱险！”
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: “泰拉的一切神圣之物在上……你们冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人无论遇到什么古怪东西，都一定要刨根问底！你们家族的人都是这个样子！我当时怎么就没选个远离前线的和平岗位呢？比如磁力线圈仓库的军需官之类的。”{n}阿贝拉德一直在焦躁地翻找着装备。此刻，他猛地抬起了头。{/n}“舰长大人，您恢复神智了！而且连医疗包都没用上。真是侥幸脱险！”

languages.text: «Por todo lo que es sagrado en Terra... ¿Acaso los von Valancius deben meter las narices en todas las abominaciones misteriosas que encuentran? ¡Tienen que llevarlo en la sangre! ¿Por qué no elegiría un puesto tranquilo lejos del frente, como intendente de un almacén de relés magnéticos o algo similar?». {n}Abelard, que ha estado rebuscando nervioso entre su equipo, alza la mirada con sorpresa.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, ha vuelto con nosotros! Y sin necesidad de medicinas. ¡Ha tenido suerte!».
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: «Por todo lo que es sagrado en Terra... ¿Acaso los von Valancius deben meter las narices en todas las abominaciones misteriosas que encuentran? ¡Tienen que llevarlo en la sangre! ¿Por qué no elegiría un puesto tranquilo lejos del frente, como intendente de un almacén de relés magnéticos o algo similar?». {n}Abelard, que ha estado rebuscando nervioso entre su equipo, alza la mirada con sorpresa.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, ha vuelto con nosotros! Y sin necesidad de medicinas. ¡Ha tenido suerte!».

languages.text: 「地球の神事すべてに…フォン・ヴァランシウス一族は遭遇したすべての忌まわしき神秘に干渉するものですが…先代譲りとは！どうして我は黙って前線を一歩退かなかったのか。磁気コイル倉庫の補給係か何かを務めていれば」{n}アベラルドは動揺して装置を奪い取ると、ハッとして目線を上げる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、お戻りになりましたか！救急キットの用意は不要ですね、よくぞご無事で！」
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: 「地球の神事すべてに…フォン・ヴァランシウス一族は遭遇したすべての忌まわしき神秘に干渉するものですが…先代譲りとは！どうして我は黙って前線を一歩退かなかったのか。磁気コイル倉庫の補給係か何かを務めていれば」{n}アベラルドは動揺して装置を奪い取ると、ハッとして目線を上げる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、お戻りになりましたか！救急キットの用意は不要ですね、よくぞご無事で！」

languages.text: « Au nom de tout ce qui est saint sur Terra... Les von Valancius cesseront-ils un jour de fourrer leur nez dans toutes les mystérieuses abominations qu'ils croisent ? C'est une vraie manie ! Pourquoi je n'ai pas choisi un poste au calme, loin des lignes de front ? Quartier-maître d'un entrepôt de bobines magnétiques, par exemple... » {n}Abélard, qui fouillait frénétiquement dans le matériel, se redresse d'un bond.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous êtes de retour parmi nous ! Je n'ai même pas eu besoin d'utiliser un médikit. Vous avez eu de la chance ! »
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de tout ce qui est saint sur Terra... Les von Valancius cesseront-ils un jour de fourrer leur nez dans toutes les mystérieuses abominations qu'ils croisent ? C'est une vraie manie ! Pourquoi je n'ai pas choisi un poste au calme, loin des lignes de front ? Quartier-maître d'un entrepôt de bobines magnétiques, par exemple... » {n}Abélard, qui fouillait frénétiquement dans le matériel, se redresse d'un bond.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous êtes de retour parmi nous ! Je n'ai même pas eu besoin d'utiliser un médikit. Vous avez eu de la chance ! »

languages.text: "Bei allem, was auf Terra heilig ist ... Ihr von Valancius steckt Eure Nase wirklich in jede geheimnisvolle Abscheulichkeit, die Euch begegnet – das muss Euch im Blut liegen! Warum habe ich mir bloß keinen beschaulichen Posten abseits der Frontlinien ausgesucht, als Quartiermeister einer Lagerhauses für Magnetspulen oder etwas in der Art?" {n}Abelard hat hektisch Ausrüstung durchsucht und blickt nun erstaunt auf.{/n} "Lord Captain, Ihr seid zu uns zurückgekehrt! Und Ihr braucht nicht einmal ein Medikit. Was für eine glückliche Fügung!"
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem, was auf Terra heilig ist ... Ihr von Valancius steckt Eure Nase wirklich in jede geheimnisvolle Abscheulichkeit, die Euch begegnet – das muss Euch im Blut liegen! Warum habe ich mir bloß keinen beschaulichen Posten abseits der Frontlinien ausgesucht, als Quartiermester einer Lagerhauses für Magnetspulen oder etwas in der Art?" {n}Abelard hat hektisch Ausrüstung durchsucht und blickt nun erstaunt auf.{/n} "Lord Captain, Ihr seid zu uns zurückgekehrt! Und Ihr braucht nicht einmal ein Medikit. Was für eine glückliche Fügung!"

languages.text: "Terra'nın tüm kutsallığı adına... Von Valanciuslar, karşılaştıkları bir gizemli garabeti de rahat bıraksa olmaz mı? Mayanızda var herhâlde! Neden ön cepheden uzakta, sessiz bir karakol seçmedim ki? Manyetik bobin ardiyesinde levazım subayı olmak vardı." {n}Ekipmanları gergince karıştıran Abelard, irkilerek yukarı bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bize döndünüz! Üstelik müdahaleye gerek olmadan. Ne şanslı bir kurtuluş!"
languages.original_text: "In all that is holy on Terra... You von Valancius poke your noses into every mysterious abomination you encounter — it must run in the blood! Why didn't I choose a quiet post away from the front lines, quartermaster of a magnetic coil warehouse or some such thing?" {n}Abelard, who has been agitatedly rifling through equipment, looks up with a start.{/n} "Lord Captain, you have returned to us! And without the need for a medikit. A lucky escape!"

traits.locale_text: "Terra'nın tüm kutsallığı adına... Von Valanciuslar karşılaştığı her gizemli garabete burnunu sokmak zorunda mı? Sizin mayanızda var herhâlde! Neden ön cepheden uzakta, sessiz bir karakol seçmedim ki? Manyetik bobin ardiyesinde levazım subayı falan olurdum." {n}Ekipmanları gergin bir şekilde karıştıran Abelard, irkilerek yukarı bakıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bize geri döndünüz! Hem de sıhhiye çantasına ihtiyacımız yok. Ne şanslı bir kurtuluş!"
